title: Population data analysis - compare electricity use

content.description:
Directions: Each of the questions or incomplete statements below is followed by five suggested answers or completions. Select the one that is best in each case.

The following questions refer to the table below, which shows population, area, and energy use of several countries.
content.question: On an annual basis, the per capita electricity usage in Ethiopia is approximately what percent of the per capita electricity usage in the United States?

skill.text: Skill 5.A: Describe patterns or trends in data.
